Package parser

Class Page

java.lang.Object
parser.Page
All Implemented Interfaces:
parser.Actions
public class Page
extends java.lang.Object
implements parser.Actions
Class that represents a page with properties: pageUrl and timeout - and allows to read its content and count number of words on the page.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String pageUrl
    Url of the HTML-page.
    private int timeout
    Idle time.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Page()
    Creates new page with default url and timeout.

    Creates new page with given timeout.
    Page​(java.lang.String url)
    Creates new page with given url.
    Page​(java.lang.String url, int timeout)
    Creates new Page with given url and timeout.

  • Method Summary

    • getPage

      public java.lang.String getPage()
      Gets text content of the page.
      Returns:
      Content of the page in a string format.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If pageUrl is not valid.

    • isLetter

      public boolean isLetter​(java.lang.String name)
      Checks if given parameter contains in english or russian alphabet.
      Parameters:
      name - Word that has to be checked.
      Returns:
      Boolean value: whether the word is appropriate for further processing.

    • countWords

      public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> countWords​(java.lang.String[] splitArray)
      Counts amount of each word on the page.
      Parameters:
      splitArray - Array of all words.
      Returns:
      Map with properties: word and amount.
